definition: Longtan district of Jilin city 吉林市, Jilin province/see also 龍潭|龙潭[long2 tan2]/Longtan or Lungtan township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
dragon pool/dragon pond/see also 龍潭|龙潭[Long2 tan2]
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long
deep pool/pond/pit (dialect)/depression
surname Tan
Longtan district of Jilin city 吉林市, Jilin province
Longtan or Lungtan township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
Longtan Ravine, scenic area in Xixia county 西峽縣|西峡县[Xi1 xia2 xian4], Nanyang 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan

sentences.english: The Black Dragon Pond is located outside Lijiang, Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 黑龍潭位於雲南麗江市郊。

sentences.english: Historically, the Black Dragon Temple had a reputation extending far beyond the village.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上，黑龍潭廟的盛名早已超出了村這一範圍。

sentences.english: Longtan Park are make of one lake, two spring and 24 moutians.
sentences.chinese: 龍潭風景區有一湖二潭，二十四座山峯環繞而成。

sentences.english: Because it is connected to the Dragon Canal, it got the name Longtan( Dragon Lake).
sentences.chinese: 因與龍鬚溝形成首尾之勢，故取名龍潭湖。

sentences.english: Excuse me, How can I get to the Black Dragon Pool?
sentences.chinese: 請問，黑龍潭風景區怎樣走？

sentences.english: We did not see at all any small views of Five Dragon Ponds and Sacrificial Altar.
sentences.chinese: 古祭壇和五龍潭的影子偶們都沒機會見到。

sentences.english: Waterfall group in 5-Dragon Pools consists 5 waterfalls.
sentences.chinese: 井岡山五龍潭瀑布羣由5個瀑布組成。

sentences.english: Travel from Wofo Mountain Villa, its distance about 200 meters. You will arrive the old dragon lake.
sentences.chinese: 從臥佛山莊出發，北行200米，可到達古老的龍潭。

sentences.english: In that three minutes, I stood by the bank of Heilongtan, Lijiang.
sentences.chinese: 三分鐘，我站在麗江黑龍潭的水道邊。

sentences.english: In the Dragon Pond are divine fish.
sentences.chinese: 可都是龍潭裏的神魚啊。

sentences.english: An old man told them that they could find water at the bottom of the Golden Loong an Pond .
sentences.chinese: 有位老人告訴他們只有金龍潭底才能挖出水來。

scenic area
